content.prompt: Historians believe that the Inka All-T’oqapu tunic symbolized rulership because

choices.label: the geometric patterns represent the ruler’s ability to read the heavens
the materials and the skills used indicate the status of the ruler
it incorporated pieces of fabric from the tunics of former rulers
it depicts the dense network of cities and towns that were within the ruler’s realm

topic.text: 5.4: Theories and Interpretations of Indigenous American Art

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Describe one or more art historically relevant interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art), its reception, or its meaning.
